item.title: Rosso
item.description: It may be located inside an Italian restaurant at JBR, but this bar certainly doesn’t fall into the ‘afterthought’ category
item.location: The Walk, Jumeirah Beach Residence, Dubai Marina, Dubai

item.title: Krossroads Bar & Lounge
item.description: Good for obscure fun, this hidden gem boasts unusual aesthetics
item.location: Khalid Bin Walid Street, Bur Dubai, Dubai

item.title: The Liquid Lounge
item.description: Walking into Liquid Lounge is vaguely how we imagine stepping out of Dr Who’s Tardis might feel - if we were Time Lords of course
item.location: Al Mina Road, Bur Dubai, Dubai
